name: thehive
label: TheHive
description: The Hive Security Incident Response Platform involves connecting external security tools, systems, or data sources with The Hive's platform. This integration facilitates centralized incident management, response coordination, and automation, enhancing overall security operations by streamlining incident detection, investigation, and resolution processes.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the Rest API endpoint URL of the TheHive server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Rest API endpoint URL of the TheHive server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the TheHive Rest API endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the TheHive Rest API endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Create Alert
operations.description: Creates an alert in TheHive based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Source Reference
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Provide the source reference for the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Provide the source reference for the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Source
parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specify the source of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the source of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Specify the severity of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the severity of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Assignee

parameters.description: Specify the assignee of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assignee of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Summary
parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Specify the summary of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the summary of the alert that you are creating in The Hive Platform

parameters.title: Attachment
parameters.name: attachment
parameters.description: Upload a file attachment that contains multipart observables data which you want to add when creating the alert in The Hive platform.
parameters.tooltip: Upload a file attachment that contains multipart observables data which you want to add when creating the alert in The Hive platform.

parameters.title: Observables
parameters.name: observables
parameters.description: Specify the list of observables that you want to add at the time of creating the alert in TheHive Platform.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of observables that you want to add at the time of creating the alert in TheHive Platform.

parameters.title: Additional Field
parameters.name: additional_field
parameters.description: Specify the additional fields required for the use case. Provide the fields in JSON format.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the additional fields required for the use case. Provide the fields in JSON format.

operations.title: Get Alert
operations.description: Retrieve detailed information of the specified alert based on its ID.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alertID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert you want to retrieve the information of the alert
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert you want to retrieve information of the alert

parameters.name: action_type

parameters.tooltip: Select the action type for updating alerts. You can choose either a single record update or a bulk update.

Single Record Update.name: alert_id

parameters.description: Specify the description of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify the status of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform

parameters.title: Group
parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specify the group of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform

parameters.title: Assignee
parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: Specify the assignee of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assignee of the task you want to create in TheHive Platform

parameters.title: Additional Field
parameters.name: additional_field
parameters.description: Specify the additional fields required for the use case. Provide the fields in JSON format.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the additional fields required for the use case. Provide the fields in JSON format.

operations.title: Get Task
operations.description: Retrieves information about a specific task from The Hive platform based on the task ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: TaskID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the task from which you want to retrieve information from TheHive Platform.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the task from which you want to retrieve information from TheHive Platform.

operations.title: Update Task
operations.description: Update the details of an existing task within The Hive platform.

parameters.title: Action Type
parameters.name: action_type
parameters.description: Select the action type for updating task. You can choose either a single record update or a bulk update.
parameters.tooltip: Select the action type for updating task. You can choose either a single record update or a bulk update.

Single Record Update.title: Task ID
Single Record Update.name: taskID
Single Record Update.description: Specify the ID of the task for which you want to update an task information in The Hive Platform
Single Record Update.tooltip: Specify the ID of the task for which you want to update an task information in The Hive Platform

Bulk Update.title: Task IDs
Bulk Update.name: taskIDs
Bulk Update.description: Specify the IDs of the task you want to update in bulk.
Bulk Update.tooltip: Specify the IDs of the task you want to update in bulk.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the task you want to update in TheHive Platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title of the task you want to update in TheHive Platform

operations.title: Delete Task
operations.description: Delete a specific task from the TheHive platform based on the task ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: taskID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the task from which you want to delete from TheHive Platform.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the task from which you want to delete from TheHive Platform.
